feature_name: Hub Beta temporary swap to Appointment Autopilot Lite
scope_summary: Temporarily replace the existing /hub/beta bundle with the Appointment Autopilot Lite build and add an APP_SOURCE override in build_app_into_site.sh so deployment can switch app sources without changing Netlify routing.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: The change is a deployment source swap and does not add regulated claims, account requirements, or legal workflow changes.
evidence: No terms/privacy document changes were introduced
Feature is local-first appointment workflow with standard browser behavior

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Appointment data remains on-device via IndexedDB with localStorage fallback and no background data export.
evidence: Hub Beta now serves static Vite assets produced from appointment-autopilot-lite
No backend endpoints or silent sync mechanisms were added in this deployment step

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: The shipped experience is appointment planning and reminders only, without diagnosis or treatment language.
evidence: Primary copy focuses on appointments, timeline steps, and leave-by timing
No medical outcomes or health efficacy claims were introduced

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: The flow reduces execution friction through pre-commitment steps and time-based cues, with explicit user controls for snooze/skip/done.
evidence: Timeline steps are generated from appointment constraints
Out-the-door mode allows user override through Snooze 5 minutes

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: The product favors concrete prompts and short actionable checkpoints, supporting low-friction activation patterns.
evidence: Steps are plain language prompts (Shower now, Get ready, Keys wallet shoes)
Reminders are in-app and scoped to pending due steps

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Immediate benefit is shipping a functioning Hub Beta appointment flow today; main tradeoff is temporary removal of legacy hub beta routes.
evidence: build_app_into_site.sh now supports APP_SOURCE override for fast source switching
Legacy /hub/beta route artifacts were replaced by the new dist output

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: UI language remains direct and practical without coercive or inflated claims.
evidence: Out The Door mode uses clear action text: Leave now, Open Maps, Snooze 5 minutes
No exaggerated productivity guarantees were introduced

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: The interface maintains readable contrast tokens, large action buttons, and mobile-responsive layouts.
evidence: Responsive CSS ships with the Autopilot build in hub/beta/assets/index-jiRtVpeF.css
Core flow actions are represented as buttons and links with visible labels

security_and_reliability.rationale: Deployment logic now performs deterministic source build and copy operations and limits hub.html inline-rewrite behavior to the legacy app source.
evidence: build_app_into_site.sh validates APP_SOURCE and dist existence before copy
Legacy hub inline rewrite is conditionally scoped to divergify-hub-app only

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No monetization surfaces or growth mechanics were introduced.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship as temporary Hub Beta replacement, then move Appointment Autopilot into the main hub app route to restore multi-feature architecture.
